publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2730 Ms Sandra White: Spearmint Rhino-That the Parliament notes the intentions of the US based firm Spearmint Rhino, which runs the world's largest table-dancing network, to expand its operations into Scotland by opening five "sex multiplexes"; further notes recent reports linking Spearmint Rhino with pornographic websites featuring the drugging, abduction and rape of women, and therefore calls upon the Scottish Executive to investigate this matter urgently and take whatever action is necessary to prevent Spearmint Rhino operating their proposed "sex multiplexes" in Scotland.

S1M-2730 Ms Sandra White: Spearmint Rhino—That the Parliament notes the intentions of the US based firm Spearmint Rhino, which runs the world’s largest table-dancing network, to expand its operations into Scotland by opening five "sex multiplexes"; further notes recent reports linking Spearmint Rhino with pornographic websites featuring the drugging, abduction and rape of women, and therefore calls upon the Scottish Executive to investigate this matter urgently and take whatever action is necessary to prevent Spearmint Rhino operating their proposed "sex multiplexes" in Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam*
S1M-2730 Spearmint Rhino (lodged on 12 February 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S1M-2730# Ms Sandra White: Spearmint Rhino-That the Parliament notes the intentions of the US based firm Spearmint Rhino, which runs the world's largest table-dancing network, to expand its operations into Scotland by opening five "sex multiplexes"; further notes recent reports linking Spearmint Rhino with pornographic websites featuring the drugging, abduction and rape of women, and therefore *believes that* the Scottish Executive *should* investigate this matter urgently and take whatever action is necessary to prevent Spearmint Rhino operating their proposed "sex multiplexes" in Scotland.
S1M-2730# Spearmint Rhino (lodged on 12 February 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-2730# Spearmint Rhino (lodged on 12 February 2002) Pauline McNeill*, Linda Fabiani*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-2730# Spearmint Rhino (lodged on 12 February 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-2730# Spearmint Rhino (lodged on 12 February 2002) Nicola Sturgeon*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2730# Spearmint Rhino (lodged on 12 February 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2730# Spearmint Rhino (lodged on 12 February 2002) Cathy Peattie*
